Majority Vote

```{r}
probs <- c(0.1, 0.15, 0.2, 0.2, 0.55, 0.6, 0.6, 0.65, 0.7, 0.75)
#count predictions for red and green
red_count <- sum(probs >= 0.5)
green_count <- sum(probs < 0.5)

if (red_count > green_count) {
  class_majority <- "Red"
} else {
  class_majority <- "Green"
}
class_majority
```


Average Probability

```{r}
avg_prob <- mean(probs)

if (avg_prob >= 0.5) {
  class_avg <- "Red"
} else {
  class_avg <- "Green"
}
class_avg
```
